keel.Algorithms.Neural_Networks.NNEP_Common.problem

Class ProblemEvaluator<I extends IIndividual>

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • keel.Algorithms.Neural_Networks.NNEP_Common.problem.ProblemEvaluator<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - IIndividual's type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProblem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationProblemEvaluator, RegressionProblemEvaluator

    public abstract class ProblemEvaluator<I extends IIndividual>
extends <any>
implements IProblem

    Abstract implementation of an individuals evaluator of a dataset problem

    Since:
    JDK1.5

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Written by Pedro Antonio Gutierrez Penya, Aaron Ruiz Mora (University of Cordoba) 17/07/2007

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration settings)

        Configuration parameters for NeuralNetEvaluator are:

        • train-data: complex Train data set used in individuals evaluation.
          • train-data[@file-name] String File name of train data
        • test-data: complex Test data set used in individuals evaluation.
          • test-data[@file-name] String File name of test data
        • [@normalize-data]: boolean (default = false) If this parameter is set to true data sets values are normalizated after reading their contents
        • [input-interval] (complex) Input interval of normalization.
        • [output-interval] (complex) Output interval of normalization.

        Parameters:
        settings - Configuration object from which the properties are read

      • readData

        public void readData()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.lang.NumberFormatException

        Read and normalize evaluator datasets

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Data not correct
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Format of data not correct

                     IDataset traindata,

        Read and normalize evaluator datasets

        Parameters:
        schema - Schema of the dataset
        traindata - IDataset with the training data
